actions.text: Reported to Senate from the Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs (without written report).

actions.committee: Senate Committee on Rules and Administration
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Rules and Administration.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Rules and Administration with amendment, S. Rept. 95-646.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A resolution authorizing additional expenditures by the Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs for inquiries and investigations.

summary.text: (Reported to Senate from the Committee on Rules and Administration with amendment, S. Rept. 95-646) Authorizes additional expenditures, not to exceed $1,126,600, by the Senate Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs for inquiries and investigations.

titles.title: A resolution authorizing additional expenditures by the Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs for inquiries and investigations.
